Adams n 1: American Revolutionary leader and patriot; an organizer of the Boston Tea Party and signer of the Declaration of Independence (1722-1803) [syn: {Sam Adams}, {Samuel Adams}] 2: 6th President of the United States; son of John Adams (1767-1848) [syn: {John Quincy Adams}, {President Adams}, {President John Quincy Adams}] 3: 2nd President of the United States (1735-1826) [syn: {John Adams}, {President Adams}, {President John Adams}] 4: a mountain peak in southwestern Washington in the Cascade Range (12,307 feet high) [syn: {Mount Adams}]
